review: I have one complaint about the Fire Stick. My TV sits on a stand with a wall plug located behind it and closer to the floor. Using the recommended extender plug, I still was losing my WiFi connection intermittently. I finally realized it was a gravity issue. The stick is heavy. Depending how the cord lies, the weight of the Stick causes it to pull away occasionally from the HDMI connection. It's not something you can see. I accidentally discovered it by jiggling the stick around. Now, knowing that, I adjust it accordingly
